means: （用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词均可表示"当……时"引出时间从句。
means: when ： 所引导的从句，其谓语动词既可是持续动词，也可是短暂动词；谓语动词动作发生的时间可以与主句谓语动词的动作是同时，或之前、之后。
while ： 句中的谓语动词应为持续动词，不用短暂动词，谓语动作发生的时间通常与主句谓语动词动作发生时间是同时。
as ： 侧重指从句与主句的动作同时进行，谓语动词可以是持续性的，可以是短暂性动词。

sentence.Network_en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentence.Network_en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentence.Network_en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentence.Network_cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

PerfectNetExp.abs: （5）时间（WHEN）：由需要的性质和消费者的工作生活习惯决定。受营销策略与促销活动影响。
人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... sorry adj. 抱歉的；遗憾的；难过的 when adv. （疑问副词）什么时候；何时 birthday n. 生日.
何时宜攻何时(When)宜防，能做到(Achieve)攻能胜，立能退，年轻时不栽培知识，老了就没有乘凉的树荫。防能安稳。
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... whatever pron. 无论什么 when 当 whenever ad. 随时.

list.abs: He said when people are learning a foreign language ., 他说当人们在学习外语时.
remember when we lost the keys ., 记得当时我们遗失了钥匙.
王心凌歌曲，王心凌的歌 ... 木马屠城记 Helen Of Troy 当你 When You… 这… This….
经典英文歌曲下载_红菱艳_新浪博客 ... 70.skater boy （艾薇儿） 63.Remember When (曾几何时） 2.God is a girl： （上帝是个女孩…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwanne, hwenne; of Germanic origin; related to German wenn 'if', wann 'when'

encyclopedia.content: 基本释义 副词adv. 1.什么时候 2.（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时， 其时 3.其时；当时；当场 连接词 conj. 1.引导时间状语时，翻译为：为当……时候，如：Don’t be afraid of asking for help when it is needed. 2.类似并列连词，翻译为：在那时， 常用于be about to do ... when, hardly...when等句型中。如： We were swimming in the lake when suddenly the storm started. 3.表原因，翻译为：既然，.如：Why do you wan

entry.def: You use when to ask questions about the time at which things happen.

entry.tran: (表示两事同时发生)在…时，当…时
entry.def: If something happens when something else is happening, the two things are happening at the same time.

example.ex: When eating a whole cooked fish, you should never turn it over to get at the flesh on the other side...
example.tran: 吃一整条鱼时，切忌把它翻过来去吃另一面的肉。

example.ex: Mustard is grown in the field when weeds are there, rather than when the growing crops are there.
example.tran: 芥菜要在地里长杂草而不是长庄稼时种植。

entry.tran: (引导从句，表示某事发生于另一活动、事件或情形期间)在…的过程中
entry.def: You use when to introduce a clause in which you mention something which happens at some point during an activity, event, or situation.

example.ex: When I met the Gills, I had been gardening for nearly ten years.
example.tran: 遇到吉尔一家时我已经做了近10年的园艺工作。

entry.tran: (引导从句，说明主句动作已经发生或将要发生时的情况)其时
entry.def: You use when to introduce a clause where you mention the circumstances under which the event in the main clause happened or will happen.

example.ex: When he brought Imelda her drink she gave him a genuine, sweet smile of thanks...
example.tran: 当他把饮料拿给艾梅尔达时，她真诚而甜美地向他微笑以示感谢。

example.ex: I'll start to think about it when I have to write my report.
example.tran: 我要写报告时会对此予以考虑的。

entry.tran: (尤用于动词和形容词后引导从句，表示某事发生的时间)什么时候,何时
entry.def: You use when after certain words, especially verbs and adjectives, to introduce a clause where you mention the time at which something happens.

example.ex: I asked him when he'd be back to pick me up...
example.tran: 我问他什么时候回来接我。

example.ex: I don't know when the decision was made...
example.tran: 我不知道决定是什么时候作出的。

entry.tran: (用于引导从句，限定或指示某事发生的时间)…的时候
entry.def: You use when to introduce a clause which specifies or refers to the time at which something happens.

example.ex: He could remember a time when he had worked like that himself...
example.tran: 他还能记得自己一度工作起来也是那个样子。

example.ex: She remembered clearly that day when she'd gone exploring the rockpools...
example.tran: 她清楚地记得她去岩石区潮水潭探险的那天。

entry.tran: (用于引出某个观点、评论或问题的原因)既然，考虑到
entry.def: You use when to introduce the reason for an opinion, comment, or question.

example.ex: How can I love myself when I look like this?...
example.tran: 我这个样子，怎么能对自己满意呢？

example.ex: Emerald starlings are fairly small when compared with other such birds.
example.tran: 与同类的其他鸟相比，翠辉椋鸟要小很多。

entry.tran: (用于引出使句子的其他部分显得让人吃惊或不大可能的事实或评论)虽然，然而,可是
entry.def: You use when in order to introduce a fact or comment which makes the other part of the sentence rather surprising or unlikely.

example.ex: Our mothers sat us down to read and paint, when all we really wanted to do was to make a mess...
example.tran: 我们的母亲让我们坐下来读书和画画，而我们真正想做的却是打打闹闹。

example.ex: The temperature sensor is making the computer think the engine is cold when, in fact, it's hot.
example.tran: 温度传感器发给计算机的信息为发动机是冷却的，可实际上它的温度很高。

sentences.sentence: "once we are home, we can rest"

list.explanation: 在情况、情势再紧迫一些时或局势、情况更紧张时

example.en: When push comes to shove，you know I'll be on your side.
example.zh: 等到局势愈发地紧迫，你知道，我会站在你一边的。

auth_sentence.content: We're not sure when the curfew is tonight.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're not sure when the curfew is tonight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're not sure when the curfew is tonight.

auth_sentence.content: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not normal when expressing grief and sadness.

auth_sentence.content: When she left, politicians spoke of little else.
auth_sentence.res_content: When she left, politicians spoke of little else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When she left, politicians spoke of little else.

Sentence.sentence: The Magician   The revolution that Steve Jobs led is only just beginning When it came to putting on a show, nobody else in the computer industry, or any other industry for that matter, could match Steve Jobs

sentences.en: When the weather is good, I usually go to the country.
sentences.cn: 若是天气好的话, 我总是到乡下去。

jushi.english: When did you see him last?
jushi.chinese: 你上次是什么时候见到他的?

jushi.english: I don't know when to start.
That was when I was eight.
jushi.chinese: 那是我八岁时的事情了。
